response.overview: Hairey London Shanti Nai is a British Bangladeshi drama film focused on the challenges faced by Bangladeshis living in London￼. The story centers around a character named Syke and his confrontation with intruders in his area, reflecting on issues of community tension, identity, and adaptation in London￼. The film uses humor and insights to shed light on the complex experiences of Bangladeshi immigrants who often find that life in London is not as peaceful as they expected
response.title: Hairey London Shanti Nai
